name: Giant Hat
tagline: Bring your app idea to life or build a better web
description:
A strong web design clearly defines your message and drives new search traffic to your website. Our portfolio of clients can attest to the exponential business growth surrounding the launch of a well-designed and properly developed website.
Giant Hat is an integrated web design and online marketing agency. Our team of web designers, developers and online marketing experts can deliver the full spectrum of website, app building and online marketing services.

We offer an impressive range of experience and expertise. Our team has built hundreds of sites, both from the ground up and on the latest CMS platforms.
